methods.name: ExecuteRequest
methods.description: Executes a request with the specified parameters

params.name: --conn
params.description: Connection settings or object (for gRPC)

params.name: --req
params.description: Request data. See GetRequestSettings

params.name: --session
params.description: Session settings. See GetSessionSettings

methods.name: GetHTTPConnectionSettings
methods.description: Gets the settings structure for HTTP connection

params.name: --url
params.description: Connection address with protocol and port

params.name: --auth
params.description: Authorization: string for JWT, structure for basic

params.name: --headers
params.description: Additional request headers

params.name: --query
params.description: Request text

params.name: --db
params.description: Database

params.name: --id
params.description: Unique request ID, if necessary

params.name: --data
params.description: String, file, or binary data of the request

params.name: --format
params.description: Response format: JSON, CSV, TSV, etc..

params.name: --ext
params.description: External tables data. See GetExternalTableStructure

params.name: --settings
params.description: Additional query parameters of the request

methods.name: GetExternalTableStructure
methods.description: Gets the description structure of the external table of the request

params.name: --name
params.description: Table name

params.name: --cols
params.description: Table column structure: Key > name, Value > data type

params.name: --data
params.description: String, file, or binary data of the table

params.name: --format
params.description: Data format: CVS, TVS, JSON, etc..

methods.name: GetSessionSettings
methods.description: Forms the session settings structure for executing the request

params.name: --id
params.description: Session ID. A new unique identifier if not specified (a new session will be created)

params.name: --check
params.description: Check for session existence. True when ID is specified and false when not, unless otherwise specified

params.name: --timeout
params.description: Session lifetime in seconds

methods.name: GetGRPCConnectionSettings
methods.description: Gets the settings structure for gRPC connection

params.name: --url
params.description: Connection address with protocol and port

params.name: --auth
params.description: Authorization: string for JWT, structure for basic

params.name: --meta
params.description: gRPC metadata structure, if necessary

params.name: --tls
params.description: TLS settings. See GetTlsSettings

params.name: --trust
params.description: Allows to work with invalid certificates, including self signed

params.name: --cert
params.description: Path to the root PEM file of the certificate if it is not in the system repository
